Container.Name: AWS EUM X
Container.Overview: AWS End User Messaging X - Modern, secure SMS/MMS messaging application for Unraid using AWS Pinpoint. Features include first-run wizard, structured logging, rate limiting, message history, and comprehensive security controls. Runs as non-root user on port 8080 with SQLite persistence and automatic retry with exponential backoff.

Config.Name: AWS Access Key ID
Config.Description: AWS IAM access key with Pinpoint SMS permissions. Use short-lived credentials or IAM roles where possible.

Config.Name: AWS Secret Access Key
Config.Description: AWS secret key for the access key ID. Never expose this in logs or screenshots.

Config.Name: AWS Region
Config.Description: AWS region for Pinpoint resources (e.g., us-east-1, eu-west-2, ap-southeast-1)

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Container data directory for SQLite database, message queue, and configuration. Mount to persistent host storage.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions (default 99 = nobody). Change if needed for your UNRAID setup.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions (default 100 = users). Change if needed for your UNRAID setup.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Logging verbosity: debug, info, warn, error. Use debug for troubleshooting.

Config.Name: Rate Limit (msg/sec)
Config.Description: Maximum messages per second. Default 1.0 to stay within AWS limits. Adjust based on your account quota.

Config.Name: Max Send Retries
Config.Description: Maximum retry attempts for failed messages with exponential backoff.

Config.Name: Base Backoff (ms)
Config.Description: Base delay in milliseconds for exponential backoff on retries.

Config.Name: Disable CSP
Config.Description: Set to true to disable Content Security Policy. Only disable if reverse proxy blocks required resources. Default: false (CSP enabled)

Config.Name: Auto Update Check
Config.Description: Enable automatic checking for new releases on GitHub. Does not auto-apply updates.

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Secret key for session encryption. Auto-generated if not provided. Set manually for multi-instance deployments.

Config.Name: Max History
Config.Description: Maximum number of messages to keep in history database.

Config.Name: Enable Wizard
Config.Description: Show first-run configuration wizard on initial startup.

Config.Name: SMS Config Set ARN
Config.Description: Optional: AWS Configuration Set ARN for event destinations and analytics.

Config.Name: Opt-Out List Name
Config.Description: Optional: AWS Opt-Out List name for compliance checking.

Config.Name: Node Environment
Config.Description: Node.js environment mode. Leave as production for normal operation.
